item.title: Weird problem
item.dc:creator: @Eson Eson
item.description:
@Eson wrote:

okay i’m trying to edit my server , i change codes and evrything but when i compile and i log on again , nothing changed!!! Can som1 help me pls?after compiling it just says ; “Finished” so nothing should be wrong ;s Very weird

my compiler code ; [code]@echo off

@TITLE EvolutionX

if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)

:compile

for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")

if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)

if defined p (goto end)

:error

echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.

:end

echo Finished!

pause

exit

[/code]

Read full topic
